name: Little Grow
description:
Pick water and  take it to the plant so it can grow higher.

Beware of the cockroaches, they love the juicy roots.

CONTROLS:

  • Left/Right: movement of the player.
  • Spacebar: jump or double jump, but careful, the gnome throws the water by doing the double jump.
  • Down + Spacebar: jump down from a platform.
  • Hold down escape: exit to menu.

Compatible with joypad.

Developed with Godot 4 beta9. The HTML5 version does not work in Firefox due to it not yet implementing necessary features. Tested with Chrome
